name: Potato Farm
description:
In this game, you control a mouse who has to take care of his potato farm.Use W, A, S, D (To move), left Shift (To interact with things)  and P (To pause).

While taking as many potatoes as you can and puting them into the box, don't let the grass grow too much or you'll lose!  

This game was made for the game jam "My first game jam 2023" .
